extendedInfo.description: SMS to Text is a SMS backup and restore app which allows you to export your SMS messages, convert to Plain Text and CSV file formats and yes, those files can be read in your phone or computer! Your exported files can be saved on your phone's SD card, and can be restored later. It is fast and easy to backup and restore your SMS messages! In addition to free version, SMS to Text Pro allows you to export your SMS messages, convert to Excel and HTML file formats and send to your email as attachment!â Features:* Support Emoji characters in text format and can be displayed in Emoji supported OS (Windows 7, Mac OS X 10.7 or later)* Filter by conversation* Filter by date* Filter by SMS type* Sorting SMS* Export to Normal plain text (*.txt)* Export to CSV, comma-separated values (*.csv)* Restore SMS from previously exported .txt or .csv file* Selectable date and time format* Support Unicode UTF-8 encoding with/without BOM* Support Windows, Unix, Mac plain text new line formatâ Our Facebook page has some Sample Output screenshotsâ¥ If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please contact us at:contactus@smeiti.comhttp://www.facebook.com/SMStoText

reviews.comment: Great, dis is wht I was exact looking for. Easy to use n works lik charm. I admire d developer works,
reviews.author: vijay pratap Singh

reviews.comment: Copies SMS messages into a text file and automatically saves to SD card. It\'s simple, easy to use, and all you have to do is copy it to your computer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice way to keep SMS archives. Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Adam Morris

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for me
reviews.comment: File is created and transfer is indicated. When opened the file is empty. Am I missing something here ?
reviews.author: J Duck

reviews.title: Needs a fix.
reviews.comment: The txt output is a mess. Can\'t tell who is saying what.
reviews.author: Sean Schafer

reviews.title: Cannot access file
reviews.comment: Like the app but cannot access the exported file when I connect my phone to my pc, the folder the settings says it exported the file to, shows on my phone, but not my pc.
reviews.author: Carlos R Blanco

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is exacltly what I was hoping for. Waiting to hear from developer on limits. .... limits to 200 messages per thread... both text and csv work great!
reviews.author: Jado Bado

reviews.title: Sooo!!! Useful !!
reviews.comment: LLLLLOVE IT !!!!
reviews.author: dsuk ds

reviews.title: It worked
reviews.comment: This app did what it said and worked.  Thank you.
reviews.author: Mark Maximus Muskardin

reviews.title: As easy as falling off a log!
reviews.comment: After opening the app click on \"Filter by conversation\", then choose whose conversation you want to save. The file will be saved on your phone, in the \"SMStoText\" folder.
reviews.author: Tod C

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I was looking for. Simple and efficient.
reviews.author: Victor Moroz

reviews.title: Verygood
reviews.comment: Thanks a lost
reviews.author: S\306\241n L\303\252 Th\303\241i

reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
reviews.comment: I prefer to store SMSes in a text file. This specialized application helps me to manage exactly that. Now if I only could find a similar application to easily store the text parts of MMS messages at one go.
reviews.author: Timo Salmi

reviews.title: \"No details\" option
reviews.comment: its by far the closest app i got no doubt! :D but it would be alot if there was an option to ignore the date and time in the txt back up. as i wanted to copy it and send an entire message thread to a friend but its difficult to read cuz of all the extra details. if u cud give that option it would be great!! :D otherwise ud totally spread this app! one of the top most essential utility apps recommended!
reviews.author: Asif Durrani

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is definitively an excellent app for SMS-backup. There are always certain things we don\'t want to delete forever, and sometimes in the middle of tons of SMS, so this tool is perfect to salvage important SMS\'s you don\'t want to get rid of.  I seriously recommend it.
reviews.author: David Pais

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Works as advertise. There was a time, I was using this app every day for work to do my time sheet. Now I use it less but it remains a very useful application. Many thanks to the developer for creating and maintaining a well designed and easy to use app.
reviews.author: Jean-Claude Noel

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Works perfect and does everything it claims! Thank you SO MUCH!  :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SMS 2 TEXT
reviews.comment: This app runs like it claimed ... It help me in managing my sms...Well done...Thanks a lot...:-D:-D:-D
reviews.author: Kurniawan Tjakrawala

reviews.title: Way too awesum!!
reviews.comment: Awesome app...just does exactly what it claims to do!! If you are looking for an app to create a back up of your msgs to view/edit from your system then this is the ONE!!
reviews.author: Shree Reshe

reviews.title: Great! CSV format in particular
reviews.comment: This is a great app and worked fine on my Desire HD. I really like the .csv option as I can use my mad Excel skillz to sort through my messages after.
